verses.verse: "For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming,<s%> <S%H1197>burning<s%> like a <S%H8574>furnace;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6213>evildoer<s%> <S%H7564><s%> will be <S%H7179>chaff;<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> that is <S%H935>coming<s%> will <S%H3857>set<s%> them <S%H3857>ablaze,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H834>"so<s%> that it will <S%H5800>leave<s%> them <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8328>root<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6057>branch.<s%>"

"But for you who <S%H3372>fear<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> will <S%H2224>rise<s%> with <S%H4832>healing<s%> in its <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and you will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H6335>skip<s%> <S%H6335>about<s%> like <S%H5695>calves<s%> from the <S%H4770>stall.<s%>

"And you will <S%H6072>tread<s%> <S%H6072>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> for they shall be <S%H665>ashes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6213>preparing,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> [even the] <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7971>send<s%> you <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And he will <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the fathers to [their] <S%H1>children,<s%> and the <S%H1121>hearts<s%> of the <S%H3820>children<s%> to their fathers, <S%H1121>lest<s%> I <S%H1>come<s%> and <S%H6435>smite<s%> the <S%H935>land<s%> with a <S%H5221>curse.<s%>"
